LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Cobalt.label: M7 "Cobalt" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Cobalt.description: A USAC military contract for one M7 "Cobalt" cargo mech. When purchased, an inactive mech will be delivered via drop pod.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Gonk.label: XM3 "Gonk" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Gonk.description: A USAC military contract for one XM3 "Gonk" heavy artillery mech. When purchased, an inactive mech will be delivered via drop pod.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Omaha.label: M110 "Omaha" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Omaha.description: A USAC military contract for one M110 "Omaha" amphibious assault mech. When purchased, an inactive mech will be delivered via drop pod.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Paraman.label: M939 "Paraman" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Paraman.description: A USAC military contract for one M939 "Paraman" airborne unit. When purchased, an inactive mech will be delivered via drop pod.
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Rocky.label: M88 "Rocky" order
LanguageData.USAC_MechOrder_Rocky.description: A USAC military contract for one M88 "Rocky" synthetic infantry unit. When purchased, an inactive mech will be delivered via drop pod.
